text: The Transkei (meaning the area beyond the river Kei), officially the Republic of Transkei was a Bantustanâ€”an area for members of a specific ethnicity. It was in the southeastern region of South Africa. Its capital was Umtata (renamed Mthatha in 2004). President of South Africa Nelson Mandela was born here. ==References== Category:Bantustans
title: Transkei
